attributes.action: Support planning permission for an NHS Dentist in Yiewsley.
attributes.additional_details: Help to support a new NHS Dentist to be opened in Yiewsley by signing this petition to kindly request Hillingdon Council approve planning permission for an application to use an empty and disused building in Yiewsley.
attributes.background: There are currently no NHS Dentists in Yiewsley and no ground floor access Dentists in West Drayton. NHS England plans to open a new ground floor access NHS Dentist in Yiewsley and Hillingdon Council are currently considering a planning application for the new service. Sign this petition.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

https://www.hillingdon.gov.uk/petitions
